contentrichtext.text: {{BLP sources|date=May 2012}} {{Infobox person | image = | name = Junko Iwao | birthname = | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1970|2|18|mf=y}} | birth_place = [[Beppu, Ōita]], Japan | death_date = | death_place = | occupation = [[Voice actress]]/[[Singer]] | alias = | gender = Female | status = | title = | family = | spouse = Harukichi Yamamoto (Feb 1998- May 2007) | children = | relatives = | ethnic = | religion = | salary = | networth = | credits =''[[Cardcaptor Sakura]]''<br>as '''[[Tomoyo Daidouji]]'''<br>''[[Ceres, Celestial Legend]]''<br>as '''[[Ceres, Celestial Legend|Ceres]]''' | website = http://www.junkoiwao.jp/ | agent = J. Island }} {{nihongo|'''Junko Iwao'''|岩男 潤子|Iwao Junko|born February 18, 1970 in [[Beppu, Ōita]]}} is a Japanese [[voice actress]] who has also released several [[compact disc|CD]] [[album]]s as a [[J-pop]] singer. Her most notable role is in [[Cardcaptor Sakura]] providing the voice to Sakura's best friend, [[Tomoyo Daidōji|Tomoyo]]. ==Notable voice roles== ===TV anime=== *''[[Atchi Kotchi]]'' (Kikue Sakuragawa) *''[[Ayashi no Ceres]]'' (Ceres) *''[[Betterman (TV series)|Betterman]]'' (Sakura) *''[[Cardcaptor Sakura]]'' ([[Tomoyo Daidouji]]) *''[[Chibi Maruko-chan]]'' (Kenta Hasegawa) *''[[Devil Lady]]'' (Jun Fudo) *''[[Digimon]]'' (Jun Motomiya) *''[[Haunted Junction]]'' (Reiko) *''[[H2O ~Footprints in the Sand~]]'' (Yui Tabata) *''[[Hunter X Hunter (2011)]]'' (Kikyo Zoldyck) *''[[Key the Metal Idol]]'' (Tokiko "Key" Mima) *''[[Macross 7]]'' (Sally Saint Ford) *''[[Mahou Tsukai Tai]]'' ([[Akane Aikawa]]) *''[[Mushishi]]'' (Setsu) *''[[My-HiME]]'' ([[Akane Higurashi]]) *''[[My-Otome]]'' (Akane Soir) *''[[Neon Genesis Evangelion (TV)|Neon Genesis Evangelion]]'' ([[List of characters in Neon Genesis Evangelion#Hikari Horaki|Hikari Horaki]]) *''[[Ojarumaru]]'' (Keiko) *''[[Puella Magi Madoka Magica]]'' (Kazuko Saotome) *''[[Romeo x Juliet]]'' (Ophelia) *''[[Saint Tail]]'' (Kyoko) *''[[ToHeart (anime)|ToHeart]]'' (Serika Kurusugawa, Ayaka Kurusugawa) *''[[ToHeart ~Remember My Memories~]]'' (Serika Kurusugawa, Ayaka Kurusugawa) *''[[Urusei Yatsura]]'' (Lum) (1985-1986 season) *''[[Vampire Princess Miyu]]'' (Riri Sone) *''[[Wedding Peach]]'' (Manami) *''[[Working!!|Working'!!]]'' (Haruna Otoo) *''[[Yu-Gi-Oh!]]'' (Dark Magician Girl) ===OVA=== *''[[Garzey's Wing]]'' (Rumiko) *''[[Jungle de Ikou]]'' (Mii) *''[[Macross 7 Encore]]'' (Sally Saint Ford) *''[[Macross 7 Plus]]'' (Hennessy, Sally Saint Ford) *''[[Magic User's Club]]'' ([[Akane Aikawa]]) *''[[Melty Lancer]]'' (Sakuya Lansaihe) *''[[New Cutey Honey]]'' (Natsuko)<ref>''New Cutey Honey Collection One & Two'' (Disk two ending credits.) [[A.D. Vision#ADV Films|ADV Films]] ISBN 1-57813-900-7</ref> *''[[Outlanders (manga)|Outlanders]]'' (Kahm) *''[[Princess Minerva]]'' (Tua) *''[[Rurouni Kenshin]]'' [[Samurai X: Trust & Betrayal|"Trust & Betrayal"]]'' ([[Yukishiro Tomoe|Tomoe Yukishiro]]) *''[[Tales of Phantasia]]'' (Mint Adnade) *''[[Variable Geo]]'' (Chiho Masuda) ===Anime films=== *''[[Cardcaptor Sakura]]'' (Tomoyo Daidouji) *''[[Cardcaptor Sakura Movie 2: The Sealed Card]]'' (Tomoyo Daidouji) *''[[Evangelion: Death and Rebirth|Neon Genesis Evangelion]]'' (Hikari Horaki) *''[[Perfect Blue]]'' (Mima Kirigoe) *''[[Tenchi Muyo! Daughter of Darkness]]'' ([[Mayuka]]) *''[[X (1996 film)|X]]'' (Kotori Monō) ===Dubbing (animation)=== *''[[The Brave Little Toaster (film)|The Brave Little Toaster]]'' (Chris) *''[[Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987 TV series)|Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles]]'' (Princess Mallory) ===Video games=== *''[[Armored Core 2]]'' (Nell Aulter) *''[[Langrisser IV]]'' (Schelfaniel) *''[[Mitsumete Knight]]'' (Lesley Lopicana) *''[[Melty Lancer]] series'' (Sakuya Lansaihe) *''[[My-HiME: Unmei no Keitouju]]'' (Akane Higurashi) *''[[Super Robot Wars]] series'' (Lefina Enfield) *''[[Tales of Phantasia]] (PS and GBA versions)'' (Mint Adnade) *''[[Tales of the Abyss]]'' (Mint Adnade) *''[[ToHeart]]'' (Serika Kurusugawa, Ayaka Kurusugawa) *''[[True Love Story|True Love Story 2]]'' (Kodachi Kazama) *''[[Virtua Fighter (video game)|Virtua Fighter]]'' ([[Pai Chan]]) ===Commercials=== She voiced [[Kagome Higurashi]] in the [[Inuyasha]] commercials for Shōnen Sunday in the mid 90's. ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *{{ann|people|777}} *{{IMDb name|0412585}} {{Persondata |NAME=Iwao, Junko |ALTERNATIVE NAMES= |SHORT DESCRIPTION=Japanese voice actor |DATE OF BIRTH=February 18, 1970 |PLACE OF BIRTH=[[Beppu, Ōita]], Japan }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Iwao, Junko}} [[Category:1970 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:People from Ōita Prefecture]] [[Category:Japanese voice actresses]] [[Category:Japanese-language singers]] [[Category:Japanese female singers]] [[Category:Japanese musicians]] [[Category:Japanese idols]] {{japan-voice-actor-stub}}
